item.title: Build Yourself a Web App in Azure
item.description: NOTE: Recently (around 19th February 2021), the basic web app architecture got updated. The new version shows more possibilities, as it uses Azure Key Vault, Azure Monitor and introduces deployment slots. When you want to build an Azure-hosted web application that will use Azure SQL Database - it looks easy. You take a Basic Web App reference architecture, and you are set. It even has the ARM Template to deploy to have a working environment in just a few clicks.
